SEARCH

Class Activity

java.lang.Object
Activity
public class Activity extends Object
The Activity class represents an activity with a name, description, cost, capacity, signed-up passengers, and an associated destination.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Activity(String name, String description, double cost, int capacity)
    Constructs an activity with the specified name, description, cost, and capacity.

    Description

    Checks if a passenger can be added to the activity (i.e., if there are remaining seats).

    Displays information about the activity including name, description, cost, and remaining seats.

    • canAddPassenger

      public boolean canAddPassenger()
      Checks if a passenger can be added to the activity (i.e., if there are remaining seats).
      Returns:
      true if a passenger can be added, false otherwise.
